meanings.definition: The act of promoting or advancing someone to a higher position or rank.
meanings.sent1: His preferments in the company were well-deserved.
meanings.sent2: She eagerly awaited news of her preferments in the upcoming promotion round.
meanings.sent3: The preferments he received at work made him feel like a superstar.
meanings.sent4: Her preferments in the organization were like stepping stones to success.
meanings.sent5: The preferments he achieved were the result of his hard work and dedication.

meanings.definition: The state of being preferred or favored over others.
meanings.sent1: The preferments of the top students were announced at the assembly.
meanings.sent2: She basked in the preferments she received from her family.
meanings.sent3: Being the teacher's pet led to preferments in class activities.
meanings.sent4: In the world of fashion, her style choices were preferments among her peers.
meanings.sent5: The preferments of the elite club members were evident in their exclusive privileges.
